title: Effect
description:
An calculated effect to an abbility e.g increase of expierence point or available mana to a character. This could be from an Item, Skill, Event or Condition.

Keep in mind that not all effect need to be game ralated, some might simply be of an administrative nature. For example skills ar normaly bought and wil have an negative effect to characters experience point

id.description: The unique identiefier of the effect

name.description: The unique name of the effect

description.example: The character has aditional healing mana
description.description: An rule technicalo description of what the effect does. Visable to characters effected by the condition and game masters.

abbility.description: The abillity affected by the effect

modifier.description: The modification that is made to the abbillity

positive.description: Whether the modification is a positive one, normaly speaking this should be true. But it might be negative for sertain conditions e.g

setting.description: The setting that this effect belongs to
